summary.para: Completes any necessary operations on the object and releases the object.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, possible return codes include, but are not limited to, the values shown in the following table.

description.para: The has not been opened for reading with a call to or the object has been closed for writing with a call to .

summary.para: Copies metadata items from the source , provided to the method, object to the destination ISpatialAudioMetadataItems object, specified with the dstMetadataItems parameter. Each call advances the internal copy position by the number of frames in the copyFrameCount parameter.

param.name: copyFrameCount
param.para: The number of frames from the current copy position for which metadata items are copied. After the copy, the internal copy position within the source SpatialAudioMetadataItems is advanced the value specified in this parameter. Set this value to 0 to copy the entire frame range contained in the source SpatialAudioMetadataItems.

param.name: copyMode
param.para: A value that specifies the copy mode for the operation.

param.name: dstMetadataItems
param.para: A pointer to the destination SpatialAudioMetadataItems for the copy operation.

param.name: itemsCopied
param.para: Receives number of metadata items copied in the operation.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, possible return codes include, but are not limited to, the values shown in the following table.

description.para: The has not been opened for copying with a call to or the object has been closed for writing with a call to .
One of the provided pointers is not valid.

param.name: metadataItems
param.para: A pointer to an object to be opened for copying

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, possible return codes include, but are not limited to, the values shown in the following table.

item.description: Open has already been called on the supplied since the object was created or since the last call to .

description.para: The provided pointer is not valid.

summary.para: Provides methods for copying all or subsets of metadata items from a source into a destination SpatialAudioMetadataItems. The SpatialAudioMetadataItems object, which is populated using an or ISpatialAudioMetadataCopier, has a frame count, specified with the frameCount parameter to , that represents the valid range of metadata item offsets. ISpatialAudioMetadataReader enables copying groups of items within a subrange of the total frame count. The object maintains an internal read position, which is advanced by the number of frames specified when a copy operation is performed.
This interface is a part of Windows Sonic, Microsoft’s audio platform for more immersive audio which includes integrated spatial sound on Xbox and Windows.
